channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After Venezuela raid, Trump says ‘We do need Greenland, absolutely’ — prompting Denmark to warn U.S. has ‘no right to annex’ the territory
item.description: “I would therefore strongly urge the U.S. to stop threatening a historically close ally and another country and people who have made it very clear tha...

item.title: Crude oil prices rise after Maduro ouster as Wall Street braces for a big week that will put the U.S. economy back on Trump’s radar
item.description: "The physical global oil market situation remains the same. Oil prices have declined due to an oversupplied global oil market."

item.title: After Venezuela, Trump Offers Hints About What Could Be Next
item.description: President Trump’s comments about Greenland, Colombia and Cuba offered a glimpse of how emboldened he feels after the quick capture of Nicolás Maduro.

item.title: Dimon’s $770 Million Windfall Shows How Banking Is Great Again
item.description: The Trump administration is lifting regulations, and deal making is heating up. For Jamie Dimon, being JPMorgan Chase’s chief executive was more lucra...

item.title: Gunboat Diplomacy Is Back. What Could Go Wrong?
item.description: The high cost of forgetting what world war is really like.

item.title: Why a CFO’s top skill isn’t capital allocation—it’s influence
item.description: What Robinhood’s CFO handoff reveals about the most important skill in modern finance leadership.

item.title: Trial Begins for Former Officer Over Uvalde School Shooting Response
item.description: Families of the victims and survivors of the 2022 elementary school shooting in Texas are expected to testify.

item.title: Supreme Court Increasingly Favors the Rich, Economists Say
item.description: A new study found that the court’s Republican appointees voted for the wealthier side in cases 70 percent of the time in 2022, up from 45 percent in 1...

item.title: Trump Says ‘We Need Greenland’ and Threatens U.S. Action in Colombia and Mexico
item.description: On Air Force One, President Trump threatened Colombia and its president, described Cuba as “ready to fall” and reasserted his desire to acquire Greenl...

item.title: 10 People Convicted of Cyberbullying Brigitte Macron, Wife of French President
item.description: The defendants made false claims about Brigitte Macron, the wife of President Emmanuel Macron of France.

item.title: Who Is Venezuela’s New Interim Leader?
item.description: Who is Delcy Rodríguez, Venezuela’s interim leader? Anatoly Kurmanaev, a reporter covering Venezuela, describes what we know.

item.title: After Venezuela, Trump Says Cuba Is ‘Ready to Fall’
item.description: The capture of Nicolás Maduro is a devastating blow to the alliance between Venezuela and Cuba. Many wonder if the island nation will be targeted next...

item.title: OPEC+ sticks with plan to keep oil flow steady amid turmoil
item.description: Key members led by Saudi Arabia and Russia agreed on Sunday to keep production levels steady through the end of March.

item.title: Is the AI boom a bubble waiting to pop? Here’s what history says
item.description: “At some point the infrastructure build may exceed what the economy will need over a short period of time.”
